hero.title: Track calories with
hero.description: Set your macro goals during onboarding, then track meals effortlessly with AI or manual entry. Monitor your progress with detailed analytics.

easyTracking.title: Easy Tracking
easyTracking.description: Log meals in seconds with AI or manual entry

dailyReminders.title: Daily Reminders
dailyReminders.description: Build healthy habits with smart notifications

visualProgress.title: Visual Progress
visualProgress.description: See your daily achievements and trends

features.title: Simple. Smart. Accurate.
features.subtitle: Everything you need for effortless nutrition tracking

aiTracking.title: AI-Powered Tracking
aiTracking.description: Snap a photo, describe your meal, or add manually. Our AI analyzes everything for accurate nutrition data.

personalizedGoals.title: Personalized Goals
personalizedGoals.description: Set your daily macro targets during onboarding and track your progress toward your health goals.

progressAnalytics.title: Progress Analytics
progressAnalytics.description: View daily averages, weight progress, and comprehensive meal history with powerful filtering options.

trackingMethods.title: Three Ways to Track
trackingMethods.subtitle: Choose the method that works best for you

camera.title: Camera Recognition
camera.description: Snap a photo of your meal and let AI do the work instantly

text.title: Text Description
text.description: Describe your meal in words and AI will analyze nutrition

manual.title: Manual Entry
manual.description: Traditional logging with our extensive food database

howItWorks.title: Your journey starts here
howItWorks.subtitle: From setup to success in just a few simple steps

step1.title: Complete onboarding
step1.description: Set your personal macro goals and preferences to get personalized recommendations

step2.title: Track your meals
step2.description: Use AI with camera, describe meals in text, or add manually - whatever works for you

step3.title: Monitor progress
step3.description: View daily averages, weight trends, and search your meal history to stay on track

cta.title: Start your health journey today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who've simplified their nutrition tracking with Kalee

support.title: How can we help you?
support.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Kalee nutrition tracking
support.contactDescription: If you can't find an answer in our FAQs, or if you need further assistance with your nutrition tracking, please don't hesitate to reach out.
